name: BMO Balanced ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to provide a balance of income and potential for long-term capital appreciation. To achieve investment objective by primarily investing in ETFs that have been selected based on environmental, social and governance factors and that provide exposure to a diversified portfolio of global equity and fixed income securities. The ETF will employ a strategic asset allocation strategy with asset class weightings of approximately 60% in equities and 40% in fixed income.

fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
